name: Tiny Angry Flappy Avis
description:
Little crap game made in godot game engine. It's just a few, but very difficult levels. I have never managed to beat the game from start to finish (I have beaten the levels individual though). 

Enter to start the game. Controls are arrow keys. No points. Coins are just to make the game pretty.

Sounds and graphics are home made. The game is public domain.

No donation button. Game is worthless...
